name: Matt and Tony's Wood Fired Kitchen

reviews.text:
Amazing!!!  Everything was perfect from the service to the food simply awesome!!  

Ambiance was also great!

Went on a Friday evening and the restaurant and bar were full.  We were lucky and just had a 2 min wait while a table was reset.

The building is medium...
